news.content:
üó≥ Action Requested: Grid Enhancement Proposal


Hi friends ‚Äì


A Grid Enhancement Proposal is live on the forum as to whether we should upgrade TF Grid Mainnet to Version Alpha-5.


We look to the community to confirm this proposal. Please head to the forum and make your vote. The poll ends in three days.


If you have any questions or uncertainties, please ask away as a reply to the forum and someone from the team or community will respond. üôè
news.excerpt: Help decide as to whether we should upgrade TF Grid Mainnet to Version Alpha-5.

previous.title: Calling All Grid 3.0 Testers
previous.excerpt: We are now ready to invite a limited group from our community to test an early release of Grid 3.0!

next.title: GetTFT.com is Live
next.excerpt: We are happy to share that anyone can now buy TFT directly with the world's most popular cryptocurrency, Bitcoin.
